name: CupCake 1
description: A moist, fluffy red buttermilk sponge baked with just a hint of the world's best cocoa and vanilla and topped with our legendary cream cheese icing.

name: BirthdayCake 1
description: This 3-layered cake reminds us of childhood and tastes exactly like Strawberry milk! The light and fluffy milk sponge is sandwiched with strawberry milk flavoured buttercream.

name: BirthdayCake 2
description: This fresh summer cake is made using fresh strawberries and topped with pink vanilla buttercream icing. We finish this off with fresh strawberries to decorate and a message and decorations of your choice.

name: BirthdayCake 3
description: It is hard to resist this chic looking and flavourful cake with beautiful rose-garden garnish; suitable as a centrepiece for any formal setting

name: WeddingCake 1
description: The harmony of nuptial white, sparkling gold leaves, and delicate flowers create an aesthetic of unmatched elegance. Each detail is carefully thought to evoke the richness of gold and floral delicacy.

name: WeddingCake 2
description: Each bite reveals the exceptional quality of our ingredients. From soft cake to gold leaf details, each component is a refinement declaration for your wedding cake
